name: Novel 3D Egg
description:
Novel 3D Egg is a three dimensional visualization of a novel formula for the egg shape discovered in August 2021. Interactive settings include the formula's parameters, colors, egg spots and lines.
Toggle:
Shell with 's'
Spots with 'd'
Lines with 'l'
Options Menu with 'o'
New egg with 'n' or SPACE
Zoom/move with mouse wheel and mouse drag

Original Article Source:
Narushin, V.G., Romanov, M.N. and Griffin, D.K. (2021), Egg and math: introducing a universal formula for egg shape. Ann. N.Y. Acad. Sci.. https://doi.org/10.1111/nyas.14680
